name: tiplica
description:
Project Tiplica

This is my first coding project. It's supposed to help my kids learn their multiplication tables, and in the future, other math topics as well.

It's in Polish, but ready to translate to any language. My idea is to make it as simple as possible.

You are most welcome to comment and help.
